name: Traffic laws apply to persons riding bicycles
text: [§291C-142]  Traffic laws apply to persons riding bicycles.  Every person riding a bicycle upon a roadway shall be granted all of the rights and shall be subject to all of the duties applicable to the driver of a vehicle by this chapter, except as to special regulations in this part and except as to those provisions of this chapter which by their nature can have no application. [L 1971, c 150, pt of §1]
